ygData.subject: Re: Najena Camp
ygData.msgSnippet: it is the crude stein what. ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong Technical Support Executive Pacific Internet Technical Support Department . Pacific Internet Limited.
ygData.messageBody:
it is the crude stein what.

Sereph wrote:
>
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> Wrong item lah, blur goons
>
> Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:
>
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> >
> > I got the crude stein easily. was with a low 30 party and we killed
> > alot of the bouncers and 3 of us got it. I got mine with a lvl 40th
> > cleric nuked the boucner and he gave it to me foc. eheheh
> >
> > Diablo wrote:
> > >
> > > From: "Diablo" <diablo99@...>
> > >
> > > After the servers were patched 2 to 3 weeks ago, Najena spawned very rarely.
> > > Used to be almost 2 elementals then 1 Najena (100% has FBR). Now I heard
> > > from my friends Najena only spawns once a day. Just a warning. That is why
> > > FBR prices go up.
> > >
> > > Drelzna room is easy to hold. Just seperate the middle spawn from the other
> > > 2 spawns about a few minutes. I camped the room at level 29 with a level 27
> > > necro and we did it nicely. Get the necro to summon a pet in the centre of
> > > the room and Drelzna will HT the pet and nothing will happen to you. I was
> > > pretty lucky with Jboots, reach there first spawn already got my pair then
> > > another group took over coz the necro had to sleep then 24 hours later the
> > > group decided to give up then me and necro friend camp for another hour and
> > > got his pair.
> > >
> > > And for research for wizards, I dont put a single practice point into
> > > research since all our research spells are useless until level 39
> > > (immobilize) so i just dump all my runes to train up skill regardless
> > > whether i get my suicide spell (AoE) or not. And an interesting bug (?) to
> > > note is that if you are level 39 and havent put the first point into
> > > research yet, you can immediately research level 39 spells once you put a
> > > point in, and dont have to go through level 16,20,24,29,34 spells...
> > >
> > > And brownies happen to KOS everyone except unknown races (treeform,
> > > wolfform, illusions etc...). Killing them will only lose fraction with
> > > brownies which KOS everyone including wood elfs. Tough bunch of level 40
> > > druids.
> > >
> > > For those trying to get Crude Steins (+10 sta +15 cha effect: minor healing)
> > > from Ogre Bouncers (lvl 37) , they are very tough. At level 37 Vs the level
> > > 37 ogre bouncer, the ogre bouncer resisted more than 20 roots and a lot of
> > > spells which did the least partial dmg. Get druids, shamans, necros if you
> > > want to fight them and dot them to death.
> > >
> > > Also, I just met NoLife in Prexus, Singaporean too Level 35 Shaman. Anybody
> > > knows if he is on this list?
> > >
> > > Mazy
> > > Level 40 Wizard
> > > Prexus
> > >
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 10:33 AM
> > > Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Najena Camp
> > >
> > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > >
> > > > Heheh, then wat say u if we make a trip for FBR coming up?
> > > >
> > > > But 1st thing 1st, I still wanna know the normal mob lvl in Najena. If
> > > all
> > > > other mobs are ard lvl 20, it will make a pure casters grp to even reach
> > > > the destination coz we will be busy nuking and meding. Once our mana all
> > > > out, all die cock stand.
> > > >
> > > > Thus I would suggest only those high lvl 20s to come along, esp when there
> > > > is no tank. Nica and Zan better buck up. Kell and Kal too if possible ;)
> > > > Afterall, FBR is more sought after by casters. Ask the tankers along
> > > they
> > > > may feel boring, hehe. But Jboot definitely need tanks, and "most
> > > > probably" they will be interested also, hehe.
> > > >
> > > > FF got his FBR at 175pp, let see if we can all get it FOC :) With 2 wiz,
> > > 3
> > > > magi at least, it shldnt be too problematic to get FBR.
> > > >
> > > > OOi, hurry up lvl leh! ;)
> > > >
> > > > Ziltus
> > > >
> > > > On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 9:51 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> > > > [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > > > > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > camping for jboots is more like luck... if u lucky u get it maybe even
> > > > the
> > > > > first kill... if u suay like me... 19 hours straight camp n only one
> > > pair
> > > > > and that fucking pair goes to someone in front of the queue... camping
> > > > fbr
> > > > > is much easier... but 3 person its impossible to camp for fbr n boots...
> > > > > bcos both are at different location... although same dungeon... but need
> > > > the
> > > > > 3 to be at that spot... unless u guys can 24 hours dont sleep... then
> > > can
> > > > > camp both spots... if u say 2 level 20 + 1 level 30 wiz/ mage... at one
> > > > > place... i think good enough... so if we have like 4 level 20 and 2
> > > > level
> > > > > 30... we can bao the whole dungeon liaoz... but then... theres always
> > > > > someone there to camp jboots... but fbr not all the time...
> > > > >
> > > > > speaking from my 19 hours in dungeon najena...
> > > > > Nicademous
> > > > >
> > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 10:26 AM
> > > > > Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Najena Camp
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Hmm, I have a friend who get Jboot in just few hrs camping - just camp
> > > > at
> > > > > > the least peak hr - S'pore time 4pm to 8 pm. This is the timing when
> > > > Inno
> > > > > > server got least players.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Now we have 3 lvl 30 kakis in SG guild - Garren, Leshrec and FF. I
> > > > shld
> > > > > be
> > > > > > able to lvl b4 weekend. 4 of us - Lvl 35 Pala, 2 lvl 30 Wiz and 1 Lvl
> > > > 30
> > > > > > Magi with pet, shld be abt to handle quite well. I propose the 1st
> > > > troop
> > > > > > Najena hunt after the SOO hunt, maybe the weekend after this, for FBR
> > > > and
> > > > > > Jboot. It may be a Fri 7pm to 3am hunt (details to be spelled out
> > > > later).
> > > > > > All those who are lvl 20 plus still got 1 week plus to lvl to 30 and
> > > > join
> > > > > > us for the hunt ;) (Zan & NIca especially, hehe)
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Hey u guys at lvl 20+ shld form some troop to go for dirk, SBS or WCS
> > > > ;)
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Ziltus Planeswalker (VS)
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > > On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 8:25 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> > > > > > [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > > > > > > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > as for jboots... its 24 hours on camp... so u just have to be
> > > > somewhere
> > > > > > in
> > > > > > > the queue... i suggest one weekend and dont plan on sleeping for 24
> > > > > hours
> > > > > > or
> > > > > > > so... then u can be sure of getting it... and at the same time...
> > > > make
> > > > > > sure
> > > > > > > theres a team with u (not someone that get his boots then hes
> > > > gone)...
> > > > > > > also... although u just have to fight Drezlna and her 2 necromancers
> > > > +
> > > > > > > petssss, there are lots of surprises that will come into the room
> > > > outta
> > > > > > > sudden... its not like if those are green to u they wont come...
> > > some
> > > > > > still
> > > > > > > will... AND they always choose to come at the right time (wrong time
> > > > for
> > > > > > > you) thats my advice... so far i see that 2 wizards level34 and 1
> > > > cleric
> > > > > > > level 36 manage to hold out that place no prob... BUT the 2 wiz
> > > alone
> > > > > > might
> > > > > > > not be enough... since drez can multiple harm touch... and each goes
> > > > > like
> > > > > > > 300hp...
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > cheers,
> > > > > > > Nicademous
